summary.span: 定义一些常量，指定文本和用户界面 (UI) 元素的内容流动方向。

span.span: Defines constants that specify the content flow direction for text and user interface (UI) elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容的流动方向通常对应于所表示语言的固有流动方向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯来语和阿拉伯语提供从右到左流动的语言的示例。Hebrew and Arabic provide examples of languages that naturally flow from right-to-left. 英语、 德语和俄语提供自然流从左到右的语言的示例。English, German, and Russian provide examples of languages that naturally flow from left-to-right. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用枚举可设置的流内容的属性元素 ()。The following example shows how to use the enumeration to set the attribute of a flow content element ().
